channel.title: How a TV Works in Slow Motion - The Slow Mo Guys :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Video Transcript Hello there, my name’s Gavin, and welcome to this episode of The Slow Mo Guys very oddly presented from my living room. A while ago, I made a video called “How a Camera Works In Slow Mo”, and the response was great. So I thought a good natural progression to that video would be how a TV works in slow mo. This is an 85-inch LCD TV, and whenever I’m playing something on it or watching something on it, my eyes and brain are being misled and tricked, giving me the illusion of watching a moving object when in fact I’m just watching several still images just shown to me very, very fast.
